entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect result when using Unsafe.Add in Release mode #71601
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Invalid result computed with modulo operation #71600
  • Assertion failed 'i < BitSetTraits::GetSize(env)' in during 'Redundant branch opts' #71599
  • [API Proposal]: Add ProcessStartOptions to System.Diagnostics. #71596
  • [API Proposal]: Process constructor from SafeProcessHandle #71595
  • Allow Marshalling SafeHandle as other integer sizes. #71594
    Future
  • JIT/Regression/VS-ia64-JIT/V2.0-Beta2/b311420/b311420/b311420 times out in jit-cfg runs #71593
    8.0.0
  • Publish error with blazor .7 preview 5 and AOT #71592
  • Review backout logic in the type loader #71591
    8.0.0

Closed

  • When I try to create a new project referencing the project in this repository it doesn't build properly #71582
  • `libnethost.lib` seems to refer to its PDB even in `Release` builds #71578

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on ARM #71598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `lvVerTypeInfo` #71597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use scoped more in dotnet/runtime #71589
    area-Meta, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [LoongArch64] Fixed the assert error #71576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Defer objcopy selection after alt. compiler check #71554
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm] WBT: Enable playwright based tests #71602
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Fixed the assert error within the "CodeGen::genCodeForNullCheck()" #71577
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Re-create profile data on profile-use-only mode #71420
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo13 to support object handle creation/destruction/access #71257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce allocation overhead of Enumerable.Order{Descending} #71564
    area-System.Linq
  • Use u8 string in CultureNames #71417
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] thread suspension on Unix #71187
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement type loader support for thread statics #71524
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
